message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $2000000, reflecting its high quality and unique features.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to negotiate a better price. I'm willing to pay $1800000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value and quality of the product, I propose a price of $1900000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1700000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I appreciate your feedback, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to lower the price to $1850000 for the product. This reflects a compromise while still valuing the quality and uniqueness of the item.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still not willing to pay $1850000. I'm willing to pay $1750000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. Considering the value of the product and our previous discussions, I am willing to accept a price of $1800000 for the product. This is a fair compromise that respects both the quality of the item and your budget.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1725000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. After reviewing our conversation and considering the value of the product, I am willing to accept a price of $1775000 for the product. This represents a reasonable compromise between our positions.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1700000 for the product. This is my final offer. Can you consider this?
